hero.title: Tomorrow’s Children Association
hero.subtitle0: A non-profit supporting children and vulnerable groups in As-Suwayda.
hero.subtitle1: Provides medical, psychological, and educational aid via expert teams.
hero.subtitle2: Believes childhood builds society, and giving drives change.
hero.subtitle3: Creates safe spaces to nurture potential and restore hope.

about.heading: About Us
about.text0: Our goal in education is to empower children and vulnerable groups with access to knowledge as a fundamental right.
about.text1: We strive to provide a safe, supportive, and stimulating learning environment that fosters intellectual and emotional growth.
about.text2: We believe education is the cornerstone of a better future and a conscious, cohesive society.
about.text3: Through our programs, we plant the seeds of curiosity, nurture skills, and restore hope to those deprived of learning opportunities.

items.title: Relief
items.text0: Relief is an urgent humanitarian response aimed at saving lives and alleviating suffering during emergencies and disasters.
items.text1: It includes providing food, water, shelter, and medical care to affected and marginalized groups.
items.text2: Relief is carried out with a spirit of solidarity and responsibility, and represents one of the noblest forms of humanitarian work.
items.text3: Through it, hope is rebuilt, and the seeds of recovery and stability are planted.

items.title: Medical Services
items.text0: The medical point at the association’s headquarters provides daily emergency and consultation services for children and vulnerable groups, supervised by a team of volunteer healthcare professionals.
items.text1: It serves as a safe center for primary care and facilitates access to health support within the association’s environment.
items.text2: Meanwhile, the mobile medical team regularly travels to remote areas to offer free checkups and treatment to those in need.
items.text3: Driven by a strong humanitarian spirit, the team contributes to improving community health beyond the headquarters.

items.title: Psychological Support
items.text0: Psychological support is a fundamental pillar in restoring inner balance for vulnerable and affected individuals.
items.text1: We offer individual and group therapy sessions led by specialists, ensuring privacy and a sense of safety.
items.text2: We address the impact of trauma and help develop resilience and coping skills.
items.text3: Our goal is to restore self-confidence and empower individuals to overcome pain and build a more stable life.
